58371.「……聖なるチカラを持つ者よ。\n 私の名前は 担い手のテルナ。\n 世告げの姫:
...you who have the sacred power. My name is
Terna, the bearer. I am one of those who are
called the Oracle Princess.

58372.「我らの主導者である 導きのロディアは\n もう ここには おりません。: Our leader, Rhodia, is no longer here.

58373.「ロディアさまの魂が消滅してしまえば\n アストルティアの大地は なすすべなく\:
Once Rhodia's soul is extinguished, the land
of Astoltia will be helpless, only to be
invaded by the coming disaster...

58374.「……私とシュゼは ロディアさまの魂を\n 邪悪な者の手から お守りするために\:
Shuzet and I have created a ward to protect
Rhodia's soul from the hands of the evil one,
and have quarantined her within it.

58375.「ですが 私たちは 結界を作りだすのに\n チカラを使いすぎてしまったようです…:
But I think we used too much power to create
the wards and our souls will eventually be
extinguished.

58376.「聖なるチカラを持つ者よ。\n ロディアさまの目覚めのときを 待つよう\n メル:
O you who have the sacred power. Tell Merue to
wait for the time of Rhodia's awakening...

58440.「……私の名前は シュゼ。\n 世告げの姫と呼ばれる者の ひとりです。:
My name is Shuzet. I am one of those called
Oracle Princess.

58441.「私は この地で 目覚めると同時に\n 邪悪な者の手にかかり 命を落とし\n 今:
As soon as I awoke on this earth, I fell into
the hands of the wicked and lost my life, and
now I remain in this world as a soul.

58442.「聖なるチカラを持つ者よ。\n 何者かが 我らの集結を阻もうとしてます……。:
O you who possess the sacred power. Someone is
trying to prevent us from gathering...

58443.「あれは……そう。\n この世界に災厄をもたらす存在の\n 手先に ちがいありま:
That is... yes. It must be a minion of the
entity that brings misfortune to this world.

58444.「お願いします。ロディアさまだけは……\n 我らの主導者 導きのロディアさまだけ:
I beg you. Only Rhodia, our leader, our guide,
please protect us at all costs...
